較.definition: (bound form) to compare; (literary) to dispute; compared to; (before an adjective) relatively; comparatively; rather; also pr. [jiao3]

較勁.definition: to match one's strength with; to compete; more competitive; to set oneself against sb; disobliging; to make a special effort

較勁兒.definition: erhua variant of 較勁|较劲[jiao4 jin4]

較場.definition: military drill ground; same as 校場|校场[jiao4 chang3]

較差.definition: mediocre; rather poor; not specially good

較真.definition: serious; meticulous; nitpicky; to take sth (or sb) seriously

較真兒.definition: erhua variant of 較真|较真[jiao4 zhen1]

較短絜長.definition: to compare long and short; to compare the pros and cons

較量.definition: to pit oneself against sb; to compete with sb; contest; battle; to haggle; to quibble

較長絜短.definition: to compare long and short; to compare the pros and cons
